item.title: Webs.com
item.dc:creator: @runewings317 runewings317
item.description:
@runewings317 wrote:

[quote=“Javerfire, post:3, topic:409385”]Well first you need to post something like this in this board
Second, you will need to log in and go back to the page editor.
This does not seem to be a hard thing to do, but if i need to i will direct you on how to do so.

I’ll give you the biggest piece of advice I can.

Don’t use webs.

he is correct, research on how to create a website with basic html, 000webs.com is the best site to host with for free.[/quote]000webs is just a ad page or something, so I’m guessing your saying 000webhost. They don’t allow to run gamin scripts so they aren’t a good resource at all… They shut my site down >:(

Read full topic

item.title: Webs.com
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

Use a free webhost and create your own website with whatever language you want. Alternatively you can install Apache2 and run your website off of one of your computers.

Read full topic

item.title: Webs.com
item.dc:creator: @Javerfire Javerfire
item.description:
@Javerfire wrote:

Well first you need to post something like this in this board
Second, you will need to log in and go back to the page editor.
This does not seem to be a hard thing to do, but if i need to i will direct you on how to do so.

[quote=“ollie123, post:2, topic:409385”]I’ll give you the biggest piece of advice I can.

Don’t use webs.[/quote]
he is correct, research on how to create a website with basic html, 000webs.com is the best site to host with for free.
